thread.title: Emmerdale spoilers: New heartbreak for Chas Dingle as her exit story is revealed
thread.title_full: Emmerdale spoilers: New heartbreak for Chas Dingle as her exit story is revealed

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Emmerdale spoilers: New heartbreak for Chas Dingle as her exit story is revealed
text:
(Picture: ITV) The relationship between Chas and Faith Dingle is about to suffer another blow when a positive heart to heart goes wrong after an apparent rejection from Faith in Emmerdale. The upsetting turn of events prompts Chas to believe that she can never reconcile with her mother and the arrival of bad news leads to Chas deciding to take Liv Flaherty away from the village. 
With relations still strained between Faith and Chas, Debbie can see how much it is affecting Faith and sets out to help the pair build bridge.s Leaving them alone to talk at Butler’s Farm, Debbie is hopeful that Chas and Faith’s hostility can be thawed.
(Picture: ITV) Both Chas and Faith speak honestly and get a lot out in the open in a powerful heart to heart. With Chas pulling no punches, both parties accept their part in their fraught relationship and it looks like they have healed a massive rift as Chas goes in for a hug.
(Picture: ITV) But when Faith recoils from the embrace, Chas is hurt and feels rejected all over again – but what caused Faith to pull away from her daughter and is there a way that she can explain before she loses Chas for good?
(Picture: ITV) Meanwhile, Liv gets the bad news that her mum Sandra has been involved in an accident while on holiday and is very unwell, prompting Chas to offer to take her overseas to visit her mum.
But as Chas and Liv prepare to leave, can peace be restored between Chas and Faith before they go?
One to watch: Wednesday 29th March at 7pm on ITV.
